body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

spack install mumps

==> Installing mumps-5.3.3-luk72jdlkekz33qd2ynhspbxrx4rnges
==> No binary for mumps-5.3.3-luk72jdlkekz33qd2ynhspbxrx4rnges found: installing from source
==> Using cached archive: /home/dealii/spack/var/spack/cache/_source-cache/archive/27/27e7749ac05006bf8e81a457c865402bb72a42bf3bc673da49de1020f0f32011.tar.gz
1 out of 2 hunks FAILED -- saving rejects to file src/Makefile.rej
==> Patch /home/dealii/spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/mumps/mumps.src-makefile.patch failed.
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 1:
    '/usr/bin/patch' '-s' '-p' '1' '-i' '/home/dealii/spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/mumps/mumps.src-makefile.patch' '-d' '.'


### Information on your system

dealii@ubuntu:~/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-skylake/gcc-9.3.0$ spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.16.0-598-2c44e62813
* **Python:** 3.8.10
* **Platform:** linux-ubuntu20.04-skylake
* **Concretizer:** original


### Additional information

no stage directory

### General information

- [X] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [X] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and **@mentioned** any maintainers
- [X] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [X] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
title: Installation issue: mumps-5.3.3
